com.learn.android.demos.toast

类 Configuration.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.learn.android.demos.toast.Configuration.Builder
  • 封闭类:
    Configuration

    public static class Configuration.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a Configuration.Builder to build a Configuration upon.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setDuration

        public Configuration.Builder setDuration(int duration)
        Set the durationInMilliseconds option of the Crouton.
        参数:
        duration - The durationInMilliseconds the crouton will be displayed Crouton in milliseconds.
        返回:
        the Configuration.Builder.

      • setInAnimation

        public Configuration.Builder setInAnimation(int inAnimationResId)
        The resource id for the in animation.
        参数:
        inAnimationResId - The resource identifier for the animation that's being shown when the Crouton is going to be displayed.
        返回:
        the Configuration.Builder.

      • setOutAnimation

        public Configuration.Builder setOutAnimation(int outAnimationResId)
        The resource id for the out animation
        参数:
        outAnimationResId - The resource identifier for the animation that's being shown when the Crouton is going to be removed.
        返回:
        the Configuration.Builder.

      • build

        public Configuration build()
        Builds the Configuration.
        返回:
        The built Configuration.
